EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Jul16 HBR Flow Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}: Thank you for registering for the HBR Consulting on Vendor Firm Management Webinar, happening on Wednesday, July 13th at 9am PST. Please use the link below to add the event to your calendar, which contains the login information to access the webinar.
Add to Calendar: http://intapp.com/images/webinars/calendar-events/Intapp_Webinar_HBR_Consulting_on_Firm_Vendor_Management.ics
